ComicInfo.Summary: Pilot Roger Baker, bitter that the lack of conflict prevents him from living up to his brother's example, is called out to New York one day in 1933 and gets attacked by a certain primate who had climbed a building and was swatting planes.
ComicInfo.Title: Robots Don't Dream!; The Hand of Glory; Showing the Flag
